14.ara-name: كتاب البيوع عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah: That the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "They (the two) are not separate from a sale except in agreement. [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Option Of The Buyer And The Seller
